([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d4+7 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d4+7 piercing

**Wizard Prepared Spells** DC 41, attack +33
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Ancient Dust](/Spells.aspx?ID=1261), [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Torturous Trauma](/Spells.aspx?ID=1270)
- **1st**
[Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (×2), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
- **3rd**
[Darkvision](/Spells.aspx?ID=60), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)
- **5th**
[False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Forceful Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=915), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
- **6th**
[Bound in Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=1262), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **7th**
[Animate Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=666), [Blister](/Spells.aspx?ID=673), [Rouse Skeletons](/Spells.aspx?ID=988)
- **8th**
[Boil Blood](/Spells.aspx?ID=874), [Flense](/Spells.aspx?ID=1265) (×2)

**Wizard School Spells** DC 41, attack +33, 2 Focus Points
- **8th**
[Call of the Grave](/Spells.aspx?ID=522), [Life Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=532)

**Bolster Dead** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per turn; **Requirements** Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spell; **Effect** You harness the residual energy from the spell you last cast into the body of an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature within 30 feet. That creature's resistances increase by an amount equal to the level of the spell cast until the beginning of the next turn.

**Drain Bonded Item** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn; **Effect** The necromancer expends the power stored in their dagger. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

</column>
